screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .vxn file in vgmstream-web
screenshot.caption: VXN file open in vgmstream-web

description: Several Gameloft video games, including Iron Man 3: The Official Game and Sacred Odyssey: Rise of Ayden, store their soundtracks and related metadata in VXN files.
VXN is a proprietary format, used only by Gameloft video games. Each VXN file contains a single song, split into several sections. Games can load, play, and loop each section of a VXN file as needed.
NOTE: VXN files may also be referred to as VoxN files.
